law.text: Examination for a certificate of competency or a national board commission for boiler inspectors or special boiler inspectors shall be in writing and shall be given and monitored by the boiler inspection section of the division. Examinations are given on the first Wednesday and Thursday of the months of March, June, September and December of each year. The record of an applicant's examination shall be accessible to said applicant and his employer.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 522, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 9.
